channel.title: Featured on PowerUp ☆ Video Game & Technology Resource
channel.description: Recent content in Featured on PowerUp ☆ Video Game & Technology Resource

item.title: Console Gamepads
item.description:
Xbox

Xbox One
Impulse Triggers with fingertip vibration feedback, Enhanced D-pad & Headset jack.
Xbox One Elite
Pro-level controller. Faceted D-pad, Hair Trigger Locks & Paddles.
Rock Candy
Removable cable, Ergonomic concave thumb sticks. Does not support headsets.
PDP Afterglow Xbox
Premium ALPS analog sticks, Dual Multi-Function wheels with 6 programmable actions.
Razor Wildcat
Wired, Elite level controller, 4 additional fully-programmable buttons.
PowerA Fusion Pro
Wired, Braided USB Cable, 4 Underside Assignable Buttons.
Hori Hoirpad
Wired, Impulse triggers, Vibration feedback, IR sensor, Ergonomic grip.
Xbox One Mini Series
Wired, Nano-sized ergonomics, Impulse triggers & rumble.
Xbox 360
Comes in wired and wireless version. Uses AA batteries or rechargeable packs.
Transforming 360
Official controller with improved, rotatable D-Pad.
Mad Catz Control Pad Pro 360
Wired, High Quality, Analog joysticks & triggers.
360 Rock Candy
Wired, Great Quality, Officially licensed by Microsoft.

PlayStation

DualShock 4
PlayStation 4. Bluetooth, SIXAXIS, DualShock Vibration, Touch Pad & Light Bar.
Horipad FPS Plus
Turbo Feature, Compatible with PS3 & PS4. Does not support headset or light bar function.
Hori Fighting Commander 4
Wired, Rotatable D-pad & Turbo. Compatible with PS3 & PS4.
Hori Fighting Commander
Turbo feature. Compatible with PS3 & PS4.
DualShock 3
PlayStation 3. Bluetooth, SIXAXIS & DualShock Vibration.
Hori Gem Pad PS3
Crystalline GEM shell with LED’s, Ergonomic grip & Turbo.
Pro EX PS3
Cross between 360 & PS3 controller. Backlit buttons, textured grip.
PDP Afterglow PS3
Wireless & Compatible with Energizer Xbox One Chargers.
Zhidong N
Backlit buttons with Turbo function. D-pad and Left-Stick can be exchanged.
HORI Sports Pad Pro
Designed for sports games. Right Analog Stick on back of the controller.
Logitech Cordless PS2
PlayStation 2. Wireless with Dual Analog mini-sticks & pressure-sensitive D-pad.
ASCII Pad FT2 PS2
PlayStation 2 Fight Pad with classic 6 face button layout and an improved D-pad.

Nintendo

Wii U Pro
Analog Joysticks & Digital Triggers (Non-pressure sensitive).
Wii U Pro SNES
Super Nintendo themed.
PDP Afterglow Wii U
Wired & Wireless. Analog-like triggers.
PDP Wii U Fightpad
Replica GameCube design. Officially licensed by Nintendo.
Wii Classic
Great for classic games on WiiWare & Virtual Console.
Wii Classic Pro
Ergonomic grip. Great for classic games on WiiWare & Virtual Console.
Hori Classic Wii Turbo
Turbo switches for all buttons. Comes in black & sky blue.
Club Nintendo Wii SNES
Classic controller distributed to platinum members of Club Nintendo.
GameCube
Twin analog thumbsticks, Eight-way D-pad & Rumble. Compatible with Wii.
Wavebird
Wireless (RF), requires receiver. Compatible with Wii.
Hori Pad Cube
Left & Right Z buttons. Comes in multiple colors.
Hori Game Boy Player
Super Nintendo shaped GameCube controller. Compatible with Wii.
Nitendo 64
Several Expansion Paks available such as Rumble.
Hori Mini Pad
Small form, dual Z trigger buttons. Superb joystick, similar to the GameCube controller.
Hori Commander
Features auto-fire buttons. Usually ships from Japan.
Super Pad 64
Features a more standard design for those who dislike the original controller.
Super Nintendo
Official console controller released in 1991.
Super Famicom
Japanese version of the Super Nintendo controller.
SNES Ascii Pad
Individual turbo & slow-mo settings for each button.
Super Game Boy
Used with the Super Game Boy Cartride. Alternate between Super Nintendo/Famicom.
Nintendo
Official console controller released in 1985.
Famicom
Japanese version of the Nintendo controller.
NES Dogbone
Official 1991 remake of the original Nintendo controller.
NES Max Pad
Features Turbo and Sliding D-pad for 360° motion.

Sega

Dreamcast
Official console controller. Two slots for Memory and Rumble Pack.
Mad Catz Dream Pad
6 buttons good for fighting games. Comes in multiple colors.
AstroPad
Auto Fire Button & Tremor Pak. Comes in multiple colors.
ASCII Pad FT
Fighting Type controller. Resembles a Sega Saturn Control Pad.
Saturn Control Pad 80100
Official controller released in 1995. Version 1.
Saturn Control Pad 80116
Official controller released in 1995. Version 2.
Japanese Control Pad
Official, released in 1994-96. No console region lock. Comes in multiple colors.
Saturn 3D Control Pad
Featured an analogue stick. Similar to the N64 controller.
Genesis MK-1650
Standard 3 button controller released in 1989.
6 Button Control Pad
Also known as the Fighting Pad 6B in Japan.
6 Button Arcade Pad
Turbo button. Model number MK-1470.
Turbo Touch 360
Octagonal, touch sensitive D-pad & Turbo.

item.title: Mechanical Keyboards
item.description:
CM Storm Quick Fire Rapid
Rapid-i, Stealth, TK, XT, Ultimate
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green
CM Storm NovaTouch
Ultra smooth, Hybrid Capacitive switches.
Cherry MX Compatible Key Stems.
CM Masterkeys Pro S
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
RGB Lighting with 16.7 million colors.
Macros and profile support.
Corsair K70 Rapidfire
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
Multi color, per key backlighting.
Corsair Utility Engine software.
Corsair K65
Switch: Red
Smooth, linear key response for ultra fast double and triple taps without the audible click.
Corsair STRAFE RGB
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
Multi-color dynamic RGB backlighting. Fully programmable, reassign any key.
Das Keyboard 4
Switch: Blue, Brown
German-engineered, gold-plated mechanical switches. Laser etched key inscriptions.
Das Keyboard 4C Professional
Switch: Blue, Brown
Greetech switches with gold contacts. Dedicated Windows key disable control for better gaming.
Das Division Zero X40 Pro
Alpha-Zulu Tactile mechanical gaming switches.
5 programmable macro gaming keys.
Interchangeable aluminum top panel.
Ducky Legend
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
Full size, great for gaming and typing.
Ducky Mini
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
Includes mouse functionality that allows you keep your hands on the keyboard.
Ducky One
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, White
Designed with narrower bezel. Double-shot key caps. Single Color LED with backlighting effects.
Ducky Premier
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, White
Keyboard for typing purists. Printed with dye-sumlimation process which will never wear out.
Ducky Shine
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, White
ABS double shot backlit keycaps. Uses a removable feet design. Backlighting effects.
Ducky Zero
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, White
Enthusiast grade keyboard. Includes the 2108, 2108L, 2108S, 2108SZ, 2087, & 2087S models.
Filco Ninja Majestouch-2
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red
Steel mounted in a rock solid body.
Front printed keys.
Happy Hacking Keyboard Professional 2
Topre Capacitive Switches. Ultra compact. Alternative key layout. Control key is in Caps Lock position. PBT keycaps.
IBM Model M
A group of keyboards manufactured by IBM starting in 1984. Buckling-spring key design. Regarded as timeless and durable.
Leopold FC500R
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red
Full-sized, featuring an no-nonsense design. Detachable cable and angled rubber feet.
Leopold FC660M Mini
Switch: Brown, Red, Green, Gray Linear/Tactile
PBT keycaps. Keyboard mode selection dip-switch. Swappable CTRL/CAPS Lock keys.
Noppoo Choc Mini
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red
Multi-Media Keys over QWEASD section. Swappable CTRL/CAPS Lock keys. WIN key lock.
Razer BlackWidow TE
Razer Switches: Clicky X, Clicky, Stealth
Tournament Edition. Fully programmable keys with on-the-fly macro recording and 10 key rollover.
Razer BlackWidow X Chroma
Razer Switches: Clicky X, Clicky, Stealth
Individually programmable backlit keys with on-the-fly macro recording and 10 key rollover.
Razer BlackWidow X Ultimate
Razer Switches: Clicky X, Clicky, Stealth
Individually programmable backlit keys with 5 dynamic lighting options and 10 key rollover.
ROCCAT RYOS MK Pro
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red
Per Key Illumination. Two 32-bit ARM Cortex processors. Achievements Display.
ROCCAT Suora
Frameless design. Robust, compact build with aluminum alloy housing. Breathing mode plus 11-level brightness.
Rosewill RK-9000V2
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown
Game-mode, Anti-ghosting, Multimedia Keys, Windows Lock. Laser printed keycaps.
Topre RealForce 87U
Switch: Topre Capacitive Tactile
Integrated Ten-key Numberpad. Swappable CTRL/CAPS Lock keys. Onboard dip-switches.
Topre RealForce 104U
Switch: Topre Capacitive Tactile
Minimized fatigue for users, even after extended use. Also available in 104UG.
Topre Type Heaven
Switch: Topre Capacitive Tactile
Gold Lasered US/English Legends. Quiet operation and a smooth key touch.
Unicomp Ultra Classic
Switch: Buckling Spring
Newly designed clamshell cover set reducing eliminating almost ½ pound of plastic.
Unicomp EnduraPro
Switch: Buckling Spring
UltraClassic with an integrated pointing stick mouse. Available in White & Black and USB or PS/2.
Unicomp Mac Spacesaver M
Switch: Buckling Spring
Configured specifically for Mac users. Convenient control for system, audio and applications.
Vortex KBC Poker 3
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, Clear
Arbitrary programming, 3 layers customization, Qwerty, Dvorak, Colemak layout.
Vortex KBT Race
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
ABS backlit and PTB non-backlit keycap versions. PTB Recommended.
Vortex KBT Pure
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, White
LED Backlit, Laser Etched ABS or Pad Printed keycaps. 60% compact design.
WASD V2 104-Key
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, Clear
Available in several different models. Support for multiple keyboard layouts.
WASD V2 87-Key
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, Clear
Available in several differnt models. Support for multiple keyboard layouts.
WASD VP3 61-Key
Switch:Blue, Brown, Red, Clear
Compact 60% design. All metal case. 3 dipswitch selectable keyboard layouts.

Cherry MX Switches

Black
Linear
60g Actuation force
Red
Linear
45g Actuation force
Blue
Tactile & Clicky
50g Actuation force
Green
Tactile & Clicky
80g Actuation force
Brown
Tactile
45g Actuation force
Clear
Tactile
55g Actuation force

item.title: PC Gamepads
item.description:
Console

Transforming 360
Improved D-Pad. Requires Microsoft Drivers. Wireless with Receiver.
Xbox One
Removable USB & Wireless with Microsoft Adapter.
Xbox One Elite
Faceted D-pad, Hair Trigger Locks & Paddles. Wireless with Microsoft Adapter.
PDP Afterglow Xbox
Wired USB. Officially licensed by Microsoft.
DualShock 3
Use with SCP Driver Package
& Xbox 360 Drivers.
DualShock 4
Use with DS4Windows or InputMapper
& Xbox 360 Drivers.
Pro EX PS3
Cross between 360 & PS3 controller. Backlit buttons, textured grip.
PDP Afterglow PS3
Wireless & Compatible with Energizer Xbox One Chargers.
Wii Classic
Adapter Required
Mayflash PC045. No L3 or R3
in Joysticks.
Wii Classic Pro
Adapter Required
Mayflash PC045. No L3 or R3
in Joysticks.
Wii U Pro
Bluetooth, Non-Pressure Sensitive Triggers. Use WiinUSoft v2.0 software.
PDP Afterglow Wii U
Wireless & Wired USB.
Analog-like triggers.

Modern

Steam Controller
Wireless, Dual Trackpads, Dual-Stage Triggers, Completely Configurable.
MOGA Pro Power
Great build quality. Compatible with mobile devices.
SteelSeries Stratus
XInput & DirectInput.
Compatible with Samsung Gear VR, Oculus, Steam.
Gamesir G3w
Wired USB. 32-bit high-speed MCU chip. XInput & DirectInput.
Logitech F510/710
Solid build quality, Wireless, Rumble, DirectInput & XInput.
ZD V Plus
Wired USB. XInput & DirectInput. Works without drivers.
Mad Catz FightPad SD
8-way floating D-Pad. Multi-speed
Turbo functionality.
Hori Fighting Commander
Wired USB. XInput & DirectInput.
Good D-pad.
SteelSeries Nimbus
For iOS & OS X.
Pressure-sensitive Buttons.
Analog Triggers.
Mad Catz C.T.R.L.i
For iOS & OS X.
Apple-Certified.
Horipad
For iOS & OS X.
Officially Licensed by Apple.
Horipad Ultimate
For iOS & OS X.
Officially Licensed by Apple.

Mobile

NVIDIA SHIELD
Wi-Fi Direct Connectivity, Stereo Headset Jack, Integrated Mic.
MOGA Hero Power
Slim design. S.M.R.T. Lock Arm. For smartphones and tablets.
PowerLead iPega
Telescopic stand for 6 inch phones. 20 hour battery life.
8Bitdo Zero
Small enough to fit on a keychain.

Classic

NES RetroPad
Original controller upgraded to USB.
Buffalo Famicom
Wired USB, Plug & Play. Usually ships from Japan.
Buffalo Classic
Wired USB, Plug & Play. Usually ships from Japan.
8Bitdo SNES30
Bluetooth & Wired USB. Also comes in Super Famicom colors, SFC30.
8Bitdo NES30 Pro
Wireless & Wired USB.
Note: LED lights pulse, can’t
be turned off.
Retro Freak
Included with the Retro Freak
game system.
Hyperkin Genesis
Wired USB. Decent quality.
Saturn SLS Control Pad
Official Sega USB Controller, Rare. Comes in many colors.
Neo Geo Pad USB
Official Controller. Compatible with
PS3 & Windows.
ASCII Seamic
USB controller for PlayStation 2, Mac & Windows.
Retrolink N64
Wired USB. Decent quality.
Tomee N64 USB
Wired USB. Decent quality.

Adapters

Bliss-Box 4-Play
www.skunx7.wix.com/bliss-box
Mayflash
www.mayflash.com
RetroPorts
www.retrousb.com
Raphnet
www.raphnet-tech.com
Connect almost any original console controller to PC through these adapters.
Xbox Wireless for Windows
AZiO BTD-V401
CSR 4.0
Kinivo BTD-400
Wireless Bluetooth USB adapters. Must be at least 2.0+EDR compliant.
Avoid cheap ones as they will drop signal.

item.title: Windows Software
item.description:
System

Microsoft Sysinternals
Advanced system utilities.
Bleachbit
Clean your system and free disk space. Deletes cache, cookies, history, temp files, logs, and junk.
CCleaner
Cleans all areas of your computer, protects your privacy, and makes it faster and more secure.
Defraggler
Defrag entire hard drives or individual files. Works with HDD and SSD.
Speccy
Detailed information on every piece of hardware in your computer.
HWMonitor
Hardware monitoring program that reads PC systems main health sensors.
HD Tune
Measures drive's performance, scans for errors, checks health status, and securely erase all data.
CrystalDiskInfo
A HDD/SSD utility software which supports S.M.A.R.T. and a part of USB-HDD.
WinDirStat
Disk usage statistics viewer and cleanup tool.
CPU-Z
Processor and RAM information tool with temperatures.
GPU-Z
Grahpics Card information tool with temperatures.
Revo Uninstaller
Lists installed programs and scans for leftovers the Windows default doesn't remove.

Security

Kaspersky
Paid Antivirus & Firewall. Protects your privacy, money, Identity, photos and family against online threats.
ESET
Paid Antivirus & Firewall. All-in-one protection against all types of online threats.
Bitdefender
Paid & Free Antivirus & Firewall. Protects you while browsing, shopping and banking. Uncovers and removes malware.
Avast
Paid & Free Antivirus. Detect viruses, malware and more, plus strengthen your home network.
Malwarebytes
Detects and removes malware with industry-leading anti-malware, anti-spyware, and anti-rootkit tech.
Anti-Rootkit
Malwarebytes, drills down and removes even deeply embedded rootkits.
Comodo Firewall
Removes existing viruses, blocks all unwanted Internet attacks, protects your system completely.
DNSCrypt
A protocol to improve DNS security. It prevents DNS spoofing and uses cryptographic signatures.
TrueCrypt 7.1a
A discontinued source-available freeware utility used for disk encryption.
GnuPG
Encrypts, decrypts, signs, digests files using strong cryptography.
KeePass
A lightweight and easy-to-use password manager. Strong security, portable, multiple user keys, and password generator.
LastPass
Save your passwords and keep everything organized in your LastPass vault.

Internet

Firefox
Open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation.
Chrome
Closed-source web browser developed by Google.
Chromium
Open-source web browser project from which Google Chrome draws its source code.
Decentraleyes
Protects you against tracking through free, centralized, content delivery.
uBlock Origin
Ad Blocker that's easy on memory and CPU, yet can load thousands more filters than other popular blockers.
HTTPS Everywhere
Browser extension that encrypts your communications with many major websites.
NoScript
Blocks malicious scripts and allows JavaScript and Java content only from sites you trust.
Privacy Badger
Automatically analyze and block any tracker or ad that violates the principle of user consent.
Google Public DNS
Global Domain Name System resolution service that you can use as an alternative to your current DNS provider.

Production

LibreOffice
Free, open-source office suite and compatible alternative to Microsoft Office.
Notepad++
Notepad replacement and source code editor which supports several programming languages.
Lightworks
Free and Paid video editor supporting resolutions up to 4K.
Blender
Professional, free and open-source 3D graphics and animation software.
Adobe Creative Cloud
Industry standard graphic design, video editing, web development, photography, and cloud services.
GIMP
Free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image retouching and editing, free-form drawing.
Krita
Digital painting application based on Qt 5 and the KDE Frameworks 5.
Inkscape
Create vector graphics such as illustrations, diagrams, line arts, charts, logos and complex paintings.
Scribus
Professional layout and publishing software supporting EPS and SVG import/export, and PDF support.
Audacity
Free, easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder.

Media

MPC-HC
Compact media player with classic look and feel, but provides advanced features and plugin support.
KCP
Kawaii Codec Pack. MPC-HC with the latest DirectShow components and focus on Hi10P content playback and quality.
VLC
Multimedia player and framework that plays most multimedia files and doesn't require codec packs.
mpv
Minimal, powerful media player that's highly customizable.
foobar2000
Music player with simple UI, low memory use and plugin support for new features.
Equalizer APO
A system-wide equalizer. Used with EQ APO or Peace GUI.
FFmpeg
Record, convert and stream audio and video.
CDisplayEx
Comic book archive viewer and sequential image viewer.
Plex
Organizes your video, music, and photo collections and streams them to all of your screens.

Utilities

Ninite
The easiest, fastest way to update or install software. Downloads and installs programs automatically in the background.
Chocolatey
A Machine Package Manager, like apt-get for Windows.
Everything
Locate files and folders by name instantly. Quick file indexing, minimal resource usage.
Acronis True Image
Provides data protection including, backup, archive, access and recovery.
7-Zip
Free archive compression utility that supports multiple formats.
Sumatra PDF
PDF, eBook, XPS, DjVu, CHM, Comic Book (CBZ and CBR) reader.
Rufus
Create bootable USB flash drives for operating systems.
AutoHotkey
Macro-creation software that allows users to automate repetitive tasks.
Wolfram|Alpha
Computational knowledge engine and answer engine.

Gaming

Steam
Delivers a range of games straight to a desktop with automatic updates.
GOG
A vast selection of classic and new games, DRM-free.
G2A
Buy and sell legit game CD-Keys for Steam, Origin, Uplay, Battle.net, Xbox, PSN and more.
Intel Drivers
Graphics chip drivers.
NVIDIA Drivers
Graphics card drivers.
PhysX
Taps into the power of NVIDIA’s GeForce GTX GPUs to create incredible effects and scenes.
AMD Drivers
Graphics card drivers.
DirectX
Microsoft end-user runtime for 3D graphics.
EVGA Precision
Overclock and adjust your graphics cards fanspeed. Display ingame temp, framerate, and clock monitoring.
MSI Afterburner
Overclocking utility which gives you full control of your graphics cards and detailed overview of your hardware.
FurMark
OpenGL benchmark test for measuring the performance of a graphics card.
SpeedFan
Monitors voltages, fan speeds and temperatures in computers with hardware monitor chips.
Reshade
Advanced post-processing injector and graphics tweaks.
Open Broadcaster Software
Open-source program for recording and live streaming. Stream to Twitch, YouTube and many other providers.

Communication

Thunderbird
Open-source, cross-platform email, news, and chat client developed by the Mozilla Foundation.
Discord
Voice and text chat app designed specifically for gaming communities.
Mumble
Open-source, low-latency, high quality voice chat.
TeamSpeak
Voice chat for online gaming, education and training, internal business communication .
Skype
Video chat, text messaging and voice calls.
VoiceMeeter
Mix audio sources coming from devices as well as applications.
Telegram
Mssaging app with a focus on speed and security.
TeamViewer
Easy, fast and secure remote access to Windows, Mac and Linux systems.
RetroShare
Secure chat and file sharing features. Includes screenshots, a wiki and support forum.

Development

XAMPP
An easy to install Apache distribution containing MariaDB, PHP and Perl.
VirtualBox
Open-source, full virtualizer for x86 hardware, targeted at server, desktop and embedded use.
VMware
Hosted hypervisor that runs on x64 versions of Windows and Linux operating systems.
Ubuntu Server
Ubuntu edition configured for web server. Can be installed in a virtual machine.
CentOS
A free rebuild of source packages from the Red Hat Enterprise Linux.
Windows Server
Supports enterprise-level management, data storage, applications, and communications.
Android Studio
The Official IDE for Android. Provides the fastest tools for building apps on every type of Android device.
Xamarin
Build & design a mobile app using cross-platform development software which simplifies mobile application creation.
Microsoft Azure
Cloud computing platform for deploying applications and services through Microsoft-managed data centers.
Digital Ocean
Simple cloud computing web host, built for developers, pay-as-you-use based model.
Putty
Free implementation of SSH and Telnet for Windows and Unix platforms.
FileZilla
Free, open-source FTP solution for both client and server.

Programming

Visual Studio
Collection of developer tools and services to help you create apps for the Microsoft platform and beyond.
JetBrains
Technology-leading software vendor specializing in the creation of intelligent development tools.
Qt
A cross-platform application framework that is widely used for developing application software.
Eclipse
IDE primarily intended for development in Java, but also supports other languages.
NetBeans
IDE primarily intended for development in Java, but also supports other languages, in particular PHP, C/C++ and HTML5.
Code::Blocks
C, C++ and Fortran IDE built around wxWidgets, designed to be extensible and configurable.
Sublime Text 3
A sophisticated text editor for code, markup and prose. Use with Package Control.
Visual Studio Code
Text editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications.
Atom
Text editor that's modern, approachable, yet hackable to the core. Full-featured, right out of the box.
Java
General-purpose programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented.
PHP
Server-side scripting language designed for web development.
Perl
High-level, general-purpose, interpreted, dynamic programming language.
Python
High-level, general-purpose, interpreted, dynamic programming language. Commonly used with Django and Flask frameworks.
Ruby
A dynamic programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. Commonly used with Rails framework.
Node.js
Event-driven I/O server-side JavaScript environment based on V8.

Plugins & Runtimes

Java
Allows applets written in the Java programming language to run inside various browsers.
Flash
Views content created with Adobe Flash, including Internet applications, and streaming video and audio.
Silverlight
Development tool for creating engaging, interactive user experiences for Web and mobile applications.
.NET Framework
3.0 | 3.5 | 4.0 | 4.5
Visual C++
2013 | 2012 | 2010 (64-bit) | 2008 (64-bit) | 2005 (64-bit)

item.title: macOS Software
item.description:
System

Onyx
Multifunction utility that performs maintenance, cleanup, turn on hidden functions and more.
CCleaner
Cleans all areas of your computer, protects your privacy, and makes it faster and more secure.
AppCleaner
Thoroughly uninstall unwanted app's files throughout your System.
MacUtil
Customize the look and functionality of the dock, finder and user interfaces.
Xtrafinder
Adds Tabs and features to Mac Finder.
CPU-X
Shows the CPU info like: CPU name, Code Name, Package, Technology, Core Speed, Multiplier, Bus Speed, Rated FSB enz.
Cuda-Z
Shows information about CUDA-enabled GPUs and GPGPUs. Works with NVIDIA Geforce, Quadro and Tesla cards, ION chipsets.
coconutBattery
Shows you live information about the battery in your Mac and iOS devices.
Disk Inventory X
Disk usage utility that shows the sizes of files and folders in a graphical way called treemaps.

Security

Little Snitch
Network Monitor that provides realtime traffic information, connectivity status and much more.
Airlock
Displays a regularly updated list of service information for the Wi-Fi access points.
Hidden
If your device is lost or stolen, Hidden will show you where it is and who has it.
TrueCrypt
A discontinued source-available freeware utility used for disk encryption.
MacGPG
Encrypts, decrypts, signs, digests files using strong cryptography.
KeePassX
A lightweight and easy-to-use password manager. Strong security, portable, multiple user keys, and password generator.

Internet

Firefox
Open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation.
Chrome
Closed-source web browser developed by Google.
Chromium
Open-source web browser project from which Google Chrome draws its source code.
Decentraleyes
Protects you against tracking through free, centralized, content delivery.
uBlock Origin
Ad Blocker that's easy on memory and CPU, yet can load thousands more filters than other popular blockers.
HTTPS Everywhere
Browser extension that encrypts your communications with many major websites.
NoScript
Blocks malicious scripts and allows JavaScript and Java content only from sites you trust.
Privacy Badger
Automatically analyze and block any tracker or ad that violates the principle of user consent.
Google Public DNS
Global Domain Name System resolution service that you can use as an alternative to your current DNS provider.

Production

LibreOffice
Free, open-source office suite and compatible alternative to Microsoft Office.
Textmate
Graphical text editor that support many different languages, syntax highlighting and packages.
Lightworks
Free and Paid video editor supporting resolutions up to 4K.
Blender
Professional, free and open-source 3D graphics and animation software.
Adobe Creative Cloud
Industry standard graphic design, video editing, web development, photography, and cloud services.
GIMP
Free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image retouching and editing, free-form drawing.
Krita
Digital painting application based on Qt 5 and the KDE Frameworks 5.
Inkscape
Create vector graphics such as illustrations, diagrams, line arts, charts, logos and complex paintings.
Scribus
Professional layout and publishing software supporting EPS and SVG import/export, and PDF support.
Audacity
Free, easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder.

Media

VLC
Multimedia player and framework that plays most multimedia files and doesn't require codec packs.
mpv
Minimal, powerful media player that's highly customizable.
Vox
Lightweight yet full-featured music player with a minimalistic UI reflecting the future.
XLD
Decode, convert, play various lossless audio files.
FFmpeg
Record, convert and stream audio and video.
Xee
Streamlined and convenient image viewer and browser.

Utilities

Homebrew
The missing package manager for OS X. Installs the packages you need that Apple didn’t.
Cakebrew
Manage your Homebrew formulas with style using Cakebrew.
Alfred
Boosts your efficiency with hotkeys, keywords, text expansion and more.
Acronis True Image
Provides data protection including, backup, archive, access and recovery.
7-Zip
Free archive compression utility that supports multiple formats.
UNetbootin
Allows you to create bootable Live USB drives.
Wolfram|Alpha
Computational knowledge engine and answer engine.
Dropzone
Makes it faster and easier to move and copy files, launch applications, upload to many different services, and more.
CloudApp
Easily share anything, anywhere.
TodoTxtMac
Minimalist, keyboard-driven to-do manager for Mac OS X that conforms to the todo.txt format spec.

Gaming

Steam
Delivers a range of games straight to a desktop with automatic updates.
GOG
A vast selection of classic and new games, DRM-free.
G2A
Buy and sell legit game CD-Keys for Steam, Origin, Uplay, Battle.net, Xbox, PSN and more.
Intel Drivers
Graphics card drivers.
NVIDIA Drivers
Graphics card drivers.
PhysX
Taps into the power of NVIDIA’s GeForce GTX GPUs to create incredible effects and scenes.
AMD Drivers
Graphics card drivers.
FurMark
OpenGL benchmark test for measuring the performance of a graphics card.
Open Broadcaster Software
Open-source program for recording and live streaming. Stream to Twitch, YouTube and many other providers.

Communication

Thunderbird
Open-source, cross-platform email, news, and chat client developed by the Mozilla Foundation.
Discord
Voice and text chat app designed specifically for gaming communities.
Mumble
Open-source, low-latency, high quality voice chat.
TeamSpeak
Voice chat for online gaming, education and training, internal business communication .
Skype
Video chat, text messaging and voice calls.
Telegram
Mssaging app with a focus on speed and security.
RetroShare
Secure chat and file sharing features. Includes screenshots, a wiki and support forum.
TeamViewer
Easy, fast and secure remote access to Windows, Mac and Linux systems.

Development

XAMPP
An easy to install Apache distribution containing MariaDB, PHP and Perl.
VirtualBox
Open-source, full virtualizer for x86 hardware, targeted at server, desktop and embedded use.
VMware
Hosted hypervisor that runs on x64 versions of Windows and Linux operating systems.
Ubuntu Server
Ubuntu edition configured for web server. Can be installed in a virtual machine.
CentOS
A free rebuild of source packages from the Red Hat Enterprise Linux.
Debian
The Stable Linux distribution is one of the most popular for personal computers and network servers.
Windows Server
Supports enterprise-level management, data storage, applications, and communications.
Android Studio
The Official IDE for Android. Provides the fastest tools for building apps on every type of Android device.
Microsoft Azure
Cloud computing platform for deploying applications and services through Microsoft-managed data centers.
Digital Ocean
Simple cloud computing web host, built for developers, pay-as-you-use based model.
FileZilla
Free, open-source FTP solution for both client and server.

Programming

JetBrains
Technology-leading software vendor specializing in the creation of intelligent development tools.
Eclipse
IDE primarily intended for development in Java, but also supports other languages.
NetBeans
IDE primarily intended for development in Java, but also supports other languages, in particular PHP, C/C++ and HTML5.
Code::Blocks
C, C++ and Fortran IDE built around wxWidgets, designed to be extensible and configurable.
Sublime Text 3
A sophisticated text editor for code, markup and prose. Use with Package Control.
Visual Studio Code
Text editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications.
Atom
Text editor that's modern, approachable, yet hackable to the core. Full-featured, right out of the box.
Java
General-purpose programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented.
PHP
Server-side scripting language designed for web development.
Perl
High-level, general-purpose, interpreted, dynamic programming language.
Python
High-level, general-purpose, interpreted, dynamic programming language. Commonly used with Django and Flask frameworks.
Ruby
A dynamic programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. Commonly used with Rails framework.
Node.js
Event-driven I/O server-side JavaScript environment based on V8.

Plugins & Runtimes

Java
Allows applets written in the Java programming language to run inside various browsers.
Flash
Views content created with Adobe Flash, including Internet applications, and streaming video and audio.
Silverlight
Development tool for creating engaging, interactive user experiences for Web and mobile applications.
Mono
